description.displayText: Annie babysat both of our boys for 2 years - from infants until toddler age. We ALWAYS could trust our children in her care. She cared for our boys as they were her own siblings. We were always assured they were loved and safe with Annie. Her calm, sweet, loving demeanor made my husband, children, and I feel at ease. We love her and she quickly became a part of our family!
